transform_def.name: poincare_q_inf
transform_def.string: let p = (1.0 / sqrt(square(sin(pi() / 2.0 + 0.0)) / square(sin(pi() / poincare_q_inf_p)) - 1.0)) * (sin(pi() / 2.0 + 0.0) / sin(pi() / poincare_q_inf_p) - 1.0) in poincare_q_inf_init_result(poincare_q_inf, p, poincare_q_inf_x)
let z = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) m = if(x == 0.0, (z + p) / (z * -p + 1.0), (z - p) / (z * p + 1.0)) in toVec2(m) * weight
